name: Mummy on the run
description: A puzzle game in a beautiful 3D landscape. Solve the puzzle in each room and fight for the liberty of the mummies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 5 GB available space
